alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 9:23AM EST until January 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches through Friday night with additional lake effect snows on Saturday. * WHERE...Crawford county. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 4 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread snow overnight tonight and Friday morning will transition to lake effect snow Friday afternoon. Lake effect snow will continue through Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
